Articles.Content:
So far when catastrophe occurs, either all kerbonauts get killed or all survives. I seen some screenshots where only two or one is KIA. Assuming it is not photoshop for comical purposes, how you do it?

Disclaimer: very, very many kerbals was hurt in making of this post. In triplets.
The 'KIA' panels do not flip up simultaneously. Take the screenshot at exactly the right time, and you\'ll have a screenshot where some of the crew shows 'KIA' and some does not.

The game will sometimes mess up in putting up the KIA screens, leaving dead Kerbals with the screaming portraits instead.

Also, it is possible to get 1-2 dead if you run out of air while using the ZOxygen mod.

And, what most people don\'t know, you can make a 1 or 2 crew pod using MuMech ;D

Edit: With the very cool feature that you get a lone Jeb as first crew ;P

And, what most people don\'t know, you can make a 1 or 2 crew pod using MuMech ;D

Edit: With the very cool feature that you get a lone Jeb as first crew ;P

How?

Jeb doesn\'t need his distraction of 2 other crew members.

Jeb doesn\'t need his distraction of 2 other crew members.

Jeb might not need it, but the rest of the universe does. They\'re not distractions, they\'re Jeb Sanity Enhancers (JSEs).

Please, Jeb could land 3 rockets on 1 damn water-tower.

But not exploding is another thing.

In part.cfg:

[tt]module = MuMechVariablePod

crewCapacity = 1[/tt]

Remember to change the existing module line instead of making a new one (don\'t know what happens then).

Where is the MuMuchModule...?

In which part do I find it.
If you use the life support addon, when you run down the oxygen level, the kermins will die off one at a time.
